nodes.bodyText:
construct Map using Map.of(...) method
do not use collection name as part of variable name
queryMap - not clear, consider something like getQueryParameters, the same for all the methods below
variable names for end users should be simplified and made clearer
why not to put status as plain value? we can not get more than one status so there is no reason to put it as a map
constructions of HarPostDataParam, HarQueryParam objects can be moved into separate method, please reuse similar logic
